thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Roman Holiday
thread.title_full: Roman Holiday - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: John L
title: Roman Holiday
text:
We stayed for 5 nights here. All the staff we encountered were extremely friendly and efficient and nothing was too much trouble for them. Termini Station is very close and handy for when using the Metro. We would recommend a room which is not facing on to the street. For eating, the Trattoria Cecio (3 minutes walk) has a great variety of dishes.
Room Tip: Room not facing on to street. See more room tips
